news_header: The IPO market showed significant improvement in 2024, with more IPOs and higher capital raised compared to previous years, indicating a rebound in investor sentiment.
news_original_title: Increased Dealmaking Signals Continued IPO Market Recovery
news_text: In 2024, the IPO market experienced a notable rebound with 221 IPOs, an increase from previous years, driven by falling inflation and interest rates. The capital raised was significantly higher, with IPOs raising $10 billion more than in 2023. The majority of new IPOs chose Nasdaq, and several companies achieved substantial market caps on their first day. Despite not reaching the highs of 2021, the overall sentiment and performance of IPOs improved, suggesting a positive outlook for 2025.
